description.fr:
{Affinity:35}\_: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.35.ligA} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de votre héros.
\---
Inflige {value:Affinity.35.ligDmg,percent} de son {%AT} à tous les adversaires si {value:Affinity.35.target} adversaires touchés.
description.en:
{Affinity:35}: Does {magicalDamage:Affinity.35.ligA} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> your hero.
\---
Inflicts {value:Affinity.35.ligDmg,percent} of their {%AT} on all opponents if {value:Affinity.35.target} opponents are hit.
description.es:
{Affinity:35}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.35.ligA} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de tu héroe.
\---
Inflige {value:Affinity.35.ligDmg,percent} de su {%AT} a todos los adversarios si {value:Affinity.35.target} adversarios son alcanzados.
description.de:
{Affinity:35}: Verursacht {magicalDamage:Affinity.35.ligA} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> deines Helden.
\---
Verursacht bei allen Gegnern {value:Affinity.35.ligDmg,percent} seines {%AT} als Schaden, wenn {value:Affinity.35.target}\_Gegner getroffen werden.
description.pt:
{Affinity:35}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.35.ligA} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> do herói.
\---
Inflige {value:Affinity.35.ligDmg,percent} de seu {%AT} a todos os adversários se {value:Affinity.35.target} adversários forem atingidos.

bgDescription.fr: On raconte que cet anneau provoquerait chez son propriétaire un besoin vital de porter des peaux de Wabbits et des maillots de bain. Quand c'est en même temps, le résultat gratte un peu.
bgDescription.en: They say that this ring causes its owner to have a vital need to wear Wabbit skins and bathing suits. Unfortunately, Wabbit skin bathing suits tend to itch a bit.
bgDescription.es: Dicen que, al parecer, este anillo provoca en quien lo posea una necesidad vital de llevar pieles de wabbit y trajes de baño. Si nos referimos a las pieles como material, el resultado es una prenda un tanto incómoda.
bgDescription.de: Man erzählt sich, dieser Ring löse bei seinem Besitzer ein starkes Bedürfnis danach aus, Wabbit-Häute und Badeanzüge zu tragen. Wenn dies gleichzeitig erfolgt, kratzt es im Ergebnis ein wenig.
bgDescription.pt: Dizem que este anel provoca, em quem o usar, uma necessidade vital de vestir peles de Wabbits e dar saltos pra frente e saltos pra trás. Se fizer tudo isso ao mesmo tempo, pode dar uma coceirinha de leve.
